title: Justice
description: The Justice card represents the symbol of truth, fairness, and law. The woman sits in her chair holding scales in her left hand symbolizing balance and logic. In her other hand, she holds a double-edged sword suggesting impartiality. She stands between two pillars representing structure and balance. A white shoe pokes out from underneath her cloak, with spiritual connotations. This is a reminder of the spiritual consequences of our actions, as well as those associated with the law.
